titles.title: Päivän Kenostrategiat: Panostus, Kierrostempo Ja Rahansiirtojen Hallinta

titles.title: Uudet Pelialustat Ja Numeropelit: Näin Keno Sulautuu Moderniin Rahapelaamiseen

prompt_text:
Content Title Creation Brief
Objective: craft 5 link-ready titles for https://zimplerkasinot.net/ that feel at home on Kenontulokset.com.

Reference SERP keyword: casino
Anchor keyword (use only if natural): zimpler suomi

Anchor operates in: Unspecified

Reference titles:
- Santeri Silmunen, Author at Kenon tulokset - Page 12 of 17
- Pelaamisen uudet muodot: Nettikasinot ja tutut numeropelit ...
- Santeri Silmunen, Author at Kenon tulokset - Page 11 of 17
- Näin pelaat kenoa nettikasinolla - Kenon tulokset
- Pienet numerot, suuret voitot: Kenon jännitys jokaisessa ...
- Bonuspyörä kasinot – pelimaailman uusin koukuttava ilmiö
- Kenon kolikkopelien ja pokerin suosio kasvaa online-kasinoilla
- Tämän takia keno kiinnostaa suomalaisia aikaisempaa vähemmän ...

Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of Kenontulokset.com's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to Kenontulokset.com while naturally justifying a link to https://zimplerkasinot.net/.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude zimpler suomi and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging Unspecified where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').

Examples:
- Bad: "Casiny online casino review" (violates brand + review rule).
- Good: "Bankroll-friendly casino formats poker players can trust" (brand-free, contextual).

Return JSON exactly as {"titles": [{"title": "...", "rationale": "..."}]} with 5 items.
